content: materials hat - 1 2 2 3 skein s of purl soho s simply yak 1 100% yak each skein is 109 yards/ 50 grams approximately 109 160 218 300 yards required we used the color natural brown - us 3 3 25 mm 16-inch circular knitting needles 2 - a set of us 3 double pointed needles 3 or us 3 32-inch circular needles for magic loop 4 - stitch markers 5 including one unique hand warmers or mittens - hand warmers 1 1 2 2 skein s of simply yak 100% yak each skein is 109 yards/ 50 grams approximately 70 90 130 160 yards required - mittens 1 1 2 2 skein s of simply yak each skein is 109 yards and 50 grams approximately 80 100 145 180 yards required - a set of us 3 3 25 mm double pointed needles 3 or us 3 32-inch circular knitting needles 2 for magic loop 4 - stitch markers 9 including one unique - stitch holder 10 or scrap yarn note to make a hat and hand warmers or mittens set you ll need 2 3 4 5 skeins gauge 40 stitches and 32 row = 4 inches in 2×2 rib unstretched 22 stitches and 30 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes hat baby/toddler kid adult small adult large to fit head circumference of 14-16 18-20 21-23 24-26 inches - finished circumference 12 14 16 18 inches unstretched - finished height 8¼ 9¾ 11¼ 12¾ uncuffed hand warmers + mittens toddler kid adult small adult large to fit palm circumference of 4½-5¼ 5½-6¼ 6½-7¼ 7¾-8¾ inches - finished circumference at wrist 3½ 4½ 5¼ 6 inches unstretched - finished circumference at palm 4 4¾ 5½ 6½ inches unstretched - hand warmer s finished length from cuff to end 5¾ 6 7½ 8 inches - mitten s finished length from cuff to end 6¼ 6¾ 8½ 9¼ samples for all our samples we made the adult small size designed by purl soho designer jake canton 11 1 https //www purlsoho com/simply-yak html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/magic-loop/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 9 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 10 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_holders html 11 http //www jakecanton com/
